content: this pattern is free on my blog or you can purchase the pdf here i went with blues and taupe for a beachy feel something i have been craving during this cold but you can use as many or few colors as you like to create your own custom palette and when you carry the yarn along the side covering it up later with the border you don t end up with a ton of ends to weave in either shown in the pattern is the throw size but stitch and row counts are included for baby to california king video tutorial and chart now included
